column2: star-shaped flower that grew in abundance in the forest of Lothlórien. Samwise Gamgee thought highly of the flower and

column1: It was like "a pimpernel (perhaps a little enlarged) growing sun-golden flowers and star-silver ones on the same plant
The word elanor means "Sun-star" in Sindarin (from êl = "star" and anor = "Sun").
